review: Connection simple,came pre-assigned to my account. Love it so far. Would like more polished YouTube support. Love the photo app.
author: PaulCr125

review: Has every app that I like on this fire tv stick, so glad that they came up with this
author: lashawn

review: I HAVE HAD THE FIRESTICK FOR ABOUT 3 WEEKS AND HAVE YET TO  BE ABLE TO WATCH  ANYTHING, I HAVE SOME GREAT SCREEN SAVERS AND A MENU GUIDE BUT I CANNOT ACCESS THE MENU AND NO AUDIO. I HAVE 1 HDMI PORT SO I BOUGHT A SWITCH/SPLITTER STILL COULD NOT ACCESS ANYTHING.
author: Wagner

review: It works as promised. Great product.
author: Link169

review: Bought this for my daughter to stream Netflix. I was a little hesitant after reading a few reviews say without amazon prime that they had issues with it being slow and not streaming Netflix well, but she has had no problems or complaints with it at all! Works PERFECT, just as well as my Apple TV.
author: Alicia

review: I love it ! Definitely worth every penny !
author: Lisa Avilez

review: It works great.  I recommend it.
author: Doris Williams
